<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Retrieve the vector tile data for Mapbox GL"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/map/tile/{zoom}/{column}/{row}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve the vector tile data for Mapbox GL

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"zoom","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},{"name":"column","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},{"name":"row","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"default response","content":{"application/vnd.mapbox-vector-tile":{"schema":{"type":"string","format":"byte"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
